Project_Description: The first Azure development is a sprawling 6-hectare, multi-tower development that transports the resort experience right in the middle of the city, with a pristine man-made beach and the iconic Paris Beach Club designed by international style icon Paris Hilton.

Project_Name: THE RESORT RESIDENCES AT AZURE NORTH
